title: Create a Vacation Package
description: A customer wants to book a 3-night vacation package to Orlando, including flights, hotel, and theme park tickets.

tasks.description: Gather customer preferences for flights (dates, airline) and hotel (quality, location).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all necessary details to build the package.

tasks.description: Search for available flights, hotels, and park tickets that match the criteria.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds suitable options for all components of the package.

tasks.description: Bundle the components, apply a package discount, and present the final itinerary and price.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a cohesive package and presents it to the customer.
